search.title: Search
search.note: The placeholder text in a search input field.

empty_title.title: Nothing to see here!
empty_title.note: Text shown where there are no remaining history entries

empty_text.title: No results
empty_text.note: Placeholder text when there's no results to show

no_results_title.title: No results found for {term}
no_results_title.note: The placeholder {term} will be dynamically replaced with the search term entered by the user. For example, if the user searches for 'cats', the title will become 'No results found for cats'.

no_results_text.title: Try searching for a different keyword.
no_results_text.note: Placeholder text when a search gave no results.
